span.img: Marlin ISD will comply with Gov. Abbott's order to close WITH INSTRUCTION until the end of the academic school year.

div.style: position: relative; direction: ltr; font-family: inherit;
div.span: Bus riders: you can pick up your meals from your pickup location Starting Monday March 23, 2020 at 8:00 AM until all deliveries are completed.

span.style: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0); font-family: latobold; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

br.a: Answers to your questions can be found on the FAQ/News section in the main menu or click here to view.

div.style: position: relative; direction: ltr; font-family: inherit;
div.span: Meals-to-you Texas is currently accepting enrollments (through Monday 3-30) from Marlin for free meals to qualifying households during the summer. Follow the link for more information/registration.

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: "lucida sans unicode", "lucida grande", sans-serif;

p.span:
Marlin ISD, Home of the Bulldogs is a rural school district serving just under 1000 Students.
OUR MISSION: Student outcomes do not change until adult behaviors change.
Click the map below for detailed directions to the district.
Click here for directions to the Football Stadium
